SVGElementEllipse.summary: The <ellipse> element is an SVG basic shape, used to create ellipses based on a center coordinate, and both their x and y radius.

blockquote.para: Note: Ellipses are unable to specify the exact orientation of the ellipse (if, for example, you wanted to draw an ellipse tilted at a 45 degree angle), but it can be rotated by using the transform attribute.
